testcase.name: A non-customer must be able to go to the apply page via the home page.
testcase.system-out: Given I open browser for and go to the Paytr production website for all scenarios.passed Then Non-customer click the apply button....................................passed Then Non-customer see the apply page........................................passed Then I take screenshot and save as "apply_page_control".....................passed

testcase.name: if a non-customer leaves any of the fields blank they should see the error message
testcase.system-out: Given I open browser for and go to the Paytr production website for all scenarios.passed Then Non-customer click the apply button....................................passed Then Non-customer see the apply page........................................passed Then Non-customer fills name, surname,phone,gmail areas.....................passed Then Non-customer chooses the business type and left the other areas empty..passed Then Non-customer accept the terms and apply................................passed Then Non-customer should see missing area warnings..........................passed Then I take screenshot and save as "check_not_printing_with_missing_fields".passed
